question: Nowadays, people of all ages from certain parts of the world spend most time at home rather than going outdoors. Discuss the reason . It is good or bad?
text: Instead of venturing out, the populace now prefers to stay at home. This is probably due to modernization, and it is certainly a detrimental prospect.

To embark on, the advancements in the field of technology have individuals a home person. Even youngsters do not go out to play or indulge in other outdoor activities. The workforce has been introduced with new concepts, such as remote job and freelancing, where a personnel can work while sitting at home. All meetings are executed through social media, such as Whatsapp, Facebook, and Skype. Moreover, children are infatuated with the latest gadgets, namely smartphones and tablets, and channelize their energy in playing video games rather than playing sports that produce fruitful outcomes. Further, the most sough-after pastime for the elderly generation is mobile phones, where there are senior citizens' groups to share feelings. Consequently, everyone is confined to their home.

The entire phenomenon is deleterious not only for individuals, but also for the society. Although home is the most secure place and nurtures a person, being restricted to it is certainly a fruitless business. This habit has resulted in isolation. The public has been living in a virtual world. People’s first preference is gadgets and web platforms. Due to this, all are becoming materialistic; no true feelings exists. The charm of face-to-face conversation is alleviating. All this invites troubles of depression, anxiety, and stress. Moreover, the community’s prosperity has hindered. The cultural heritage is losing its significance. Instead of attending cultural events or other get togethers, the public remains at home to find solace in the digital world. Therefore, the individual personality and society’s development has hindered.
To recapitulate, today people love to remain at home rather than spending time outside because of technological innovations, and it has jeopardized the populace as well as the communities.

error_list.error: expresses position, direction or location, or point in time
